edu.wm.cs.cs301.cullenrombach.falstad

Class MazeBuilderPrim

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wm.cs.cs301.cullenrombach.falstad.MazeBuilder
      • edu.wm.cs.cs301.cullenrombach.falstad.MazeBuilderPrim
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class MazeBuilderPrim
extends MazeBuilder
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class has the responsibility to create a maze of given dimensions (width, height) together with a solution based on a distance matrix. The Maze class depends on it. The MazeBuilder performs its calculations within its own separate thread such that communication between Maze and MazeBuilder operates as follows. Maze calls the build() method and provides width and height. Maze has a call back method newMaze that this class calls to communicate a new maze and a BSP root node and a solution. The maze is built with a randomized version of Prim's algorithm. This means a spanning tree is expanded into a set of cells by removing walls from the maze.
    Author:
    Jones.Andrew
